trans-unit.source: Specifies values representing possible roles for an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 指定值，它表示可能可访问对象的角色。

trans-unit.source: The role of the object describes the function of the object and is used by accessibility applications.
trans-unit.target: 对象的角色描述对象的功能，并使用辅助功能应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName> For additional information about the accessibility application, search for "Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) library.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName>有关辅助功能应用程序的其他信息，搜索"Microsoft Active Accessibility"Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) 库中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: An alert or condition that you can notify a user about.
trans-unit.target: 警报或可以通知用户有关的条件。

trans-unit.source: Use this role only for objects that embody an alert but are not associated with another user interface element, such as a message box, graphic, text, or sound.
trans-unit.target: 使用此角色仅为体现了警报，但不与另一个用户界面元素，如消息框、 图形、 文本或声音相关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
An animation control, which contains content that is changing over time, such as a control that displays a series of bitmap frames, like a filmstrip.
trans-unit.target: 动画控件，其中包含在一段时间，例如一个控件，显示一系列位图帧，与电影胶片变化的内容。

trans-unit.source: Animation controls are usually displayed when files are being copied, or when some other time-consuming task is being performed.
trans-unit.target: 动画控件通常显示当正在复制文件，或者当正在执行耗时的某个其他任务。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The main window for an application.
To be added.
A window border.
The entire border is represented by a single object, rather than by separate objects for each side.
trans-unit.target: 按单个对象，而不是每侧的单独对象表示的整个边框。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A button that drops down a list of items.
trans-unit.target: 一个下拉列表的项的按钮。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A button that drops down a grid.
To be added.
A button that drops down a menu.
To be added.
A caret, which is a flashing line, block, or bitmap that marks the location of the insertion point in a window's client area.
trans-unit.target: 插入符号，即闪烁的行、 块或标记在窗口的工作区中的插入点的位置的位图。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A cell within a table.
To be added.
A cartoon-like graphic object, such as Microsoft Office Assistant, which is typically displayed to provide help to users of an application.
trans-unit.target: 一个类似于卡通的图形对象，如 Microsoft Office 助手，它通常显示以向应用程序的用户提供帮助。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A graphical image used to represent data.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示数据的图形映像。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A check box control, which is an option that can be turned on or off independent of other options.
trans-unit.target: 复选框控件，这是一个选项，可打开或关闭独立于其他选项。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A window's user area.
To be added.
A control that displays the time.
To be added.
A column of cells within a table.
To be added.
A column header, which provides a visual label for a column in a table.
trans-unit.target: 列标题，为表中的列提供可视标签。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A combo box, which is an edit control with an associated list box that provides a set of predefined choices.
trans-unit.target: 组合框，这是具有相关联的列表框，它提供一组预定义的选择的编辑控件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A mouse pointer.
To be added.
A system-provided role.
To be added.
A graphical image used to diagram data.
trans-unit.target: 用于关系图数据的图形图像。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A dial or knob.
This can also be a read-only object, like a speedometer.
trans-unit.target: 这也可以是只读的对象，像速度计一样。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A dialog box or message box.
To be added.
A document window, which is always contained within an application window.
trans-unit.target: 文档窗口，始终包含在应用程序窗口。

trans-unit.source: This role applies only to multiple-document interface (MDI) windows and refers to an object that contains the MDI title bar.
trans-unit.target: 此角色仅适用于多文档界面 (MDI) windows，指的是包含 MDI 标题栏的对象。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A drop-down list box.
This control shows one item and allows the user to display and select another from a list of alternative choices.
trans-unit.target: 此控件将显示一个项，并允许用户可以显示并从备用选项列表中选择另一个。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A mathematical equation.
To be added.
A picture.
To be added.
A special mouse pointer, which allows a user to manipulate user interface elements such as a window.
trans-unit.target: 特殊鼠标指针，这样用户就可以操作用户界面元素，如某个窗口。

trans-unit.source: For example, a user can click and drag a sizing grip in the lower-right corner of a window to resize it.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可以单击并拖动以调整其大小的窗口右下角中的大小调整手柄。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The objects grouped in a logical manner.
There can be a parent-child relationship between the grouping object and the objects it contains.
trans-unit.target: 可以有分组对象和包含的对象之间的父-子关系。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A Help display in the form of a ToolTip or Help balloon, which contains buttons and labels that users can click to open custom Help topics.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示或帮助气球，其中包含按钮和标签，用户可以单击以打开自定义帮助主题的形式显示帮助内容。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A hot-key field that allows the user to enter a combination or sequence of keystrokes to be used as a hot key, which enables users to perform an action quickly.
trans-unit.target: 允许用户输入的组合或的击键用作热键，这使得用户能够快速执行操作的序列的热键字段。

trans-unit.source: A hot-key control displays the keystrokes entered by the user and ensures that the user selects a valid key combination.
trans-unit.target: 热键控件显示用户输入的击键，并确保用户选择有效的键组合。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
An indicator, such as a pointer graphic, that points to the current item.
trans-unit.target: 指示器，如指针图形，指向当前项。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A control designed for entering Internet Protocol (IP) addresses.
trans-unit.target: 一个控件，用于输入 Internet 协议 (IP) 地址。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A link, which is a connection between a source document and a destination document.
trans-unit.target: 链接，这是源文档和目标文档之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: This object might look like text or a graphic, but it acts like a button.
trans-unit.target: 此对象可能如下所示文本或图形，但其行为类似于一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A list box, which allows the user to select one or more items.
trans-unit.target: 列表框中，这样用户就可以选择一个或多个项。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
An item in a list box or the list portion of a combo box, drop-down list box, or drop-down combo box.
trans-unit.target: 列表框或组合框、 下拉列表框中或下拉组合框的列表部分中的项。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A menu bar, usually beneath the title bar of a window, from which users can select menus.
trans-unit.target: 菜单栏，通常下一个窗口，用户可以从中选择菜单的标题栏。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A menu item, which is an entry in a menu that a user can choose to carry out a command, select an option, or display another menu.
trans-unit.target: 菜单项，这是用户可以选择执行命令的菜单中的条目，选择一个选项，或显示另一个菜单。

trans-unit.source: Functionally, a menu item can be equivalent to a push button, radio button, check box, or menu.
trans-unit.target: 就功能而言，可以将菜单项等效于下压按钮、 单选按钮、 复选框或菜单。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A menu, which presents a list of options from which the user can make a selection to perform an action.
trans-unit.target: 菜单，用于提供用户可以从中进行选择，以执行操作的选项的列表。

trans-unit.source: All menu types must have this role, including drop-down menus that are displayed by selection from a menu bar, and shortcut menus that are displayed when the right mouse button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 所有菜单类型必须都具有此角色，包括从菜单栏中，选择显示的下拉列表菜单和快捷菜单单击鼠标右键按钮时显示。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
No role.
To be added.
An outline or tree structure, such as a tree view control, which displays a hierarchical list and usually allows the user to expand and collapse branches.
trans-unit.target: 大纲或树结构，如一个树视图控件，它显示的分层列表，并通常允许用户可以展开和折叠分支。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A control that navigates like an outline item.
trans-unit.target: 一个控件，如大纲项导航。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
An item in an outline or tree structure.
To be added.
A property page that allows a user to view the attributes for a page, such as the page's title, whether it is a home page, or whether the page has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 属性页，它允许用户查看页上，如页的标题、 是否在主页上，或是否已修改页的属性。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the only child of this control is a grouped object that contains the contents of the associated page.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，此控件的唯一子级是页的分组的对象，其中包含关联的内容。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A container of page tab controls.
To be added.
A separate area in a frame, a split document window, or a rectangular area of the status bar that can be used to display information.
trans-unit.target: 框、 拆分文档窗口中或可以用于显示信息的状态栏的矩形区域中单独的区域。

trans-unit.source: Users can navigate between panes and within the contents of the current pane, but cannot navigate between items in different panes.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以导航窗格之间以及当前窗格中，内容中，但不能在不同窗格中的项之间导航。

trans-unit.source: Thus, panes represent a level of grouping lower than frame windows or documents, but above individual controls.
trans-unit.target: 因此，窗格表示低于框架窗口或文档，但高于单个控件的分组级别。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the user navigates between panes by pressing TAB, F6, or CTRL+TAB, depending on the context.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，用户通过按 TAB、 F6、 或 CTRL + 选项卡上，具体取决于上下文在窗格间导航。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A progress bar, which indicates the progress of a lengthy operation by displaying colored lines inside a horizontal rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 进度栏，通过显示水平矩形内彩色的线条来指示较长的操作的进度。

trans-unit.source: The length of the lines in relation to the length of the rectangle corresponds to the percentage of the operation that is complete.
trans-unit.target: 相对于矩形的长度的行的长度对应的操作已完成的百分比。

trans-unit.source: This control does not take user input.
trans-unit.target: 此控件不需要用户输入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A property page, which is a dialog box that controls the appearance and the behavior of an object, such as a file or resource.
trans-unit.target: 属性页中，这是一个对话框，其中控件的外观和行为的对象，如文件或资源。

trans-unit.source: A property page's appearance differs according to its purpose.
trans-unit.target: 属性页的外观不同根据其用途。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A push button control, which is a small rectangular control that a user can turn on or off.
trans-unit.target: 下压按钮控件，是一个小的矩形控件，用户可以打开或关闭。

trans-unit.source: A push button, also known as a command button, has a raised appearance in its default off state and a sunken appearance when it is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 在打开时下, 压按钮，也称为命令按钮，关闭状态和凹陷外观其默认情况下已引发的外观。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
An option button, also known as a radio button.
trans-unit.target: 选项按钮，也称为一个单选按钮。

trans-unit.source: All objects sharing a single parent that have this attribute are assumed to be part of a single mutually exclusive group.
trans-unit.target: 假定共享一个父代具有此属性的所有对象都是单个的互相排斥组的一部分。

trans-unit.source: You can use grouped objects to divide option buttons into separate groups when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用分组的对象划分为不同的组在必要时多选项按钮。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A row of cells within a table.
To be added.
A row header, which provides a visual label for a table row.
trans-unit.target: 行标题，为表行中提供可视标签。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A vertical or horizontal scroll bar, which can be either part of the client area or used in a control.
trans-unit.target: 垂直或水平滚动条，它可以是客户端区域的一部分或在控件中使用。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A space divided visually into two regions, such as a separator menu item or a separator dividing split panes within a window.
trans-unit.target: 空格直观地划分为两个区域，如分隔符菜单项或除以的时间段内的拆分窗格一个分隔符。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A control, sometimes called a trackbar, that enables a user to adjust a setting in given increments between minimum and maximum values by moving a slider.
trans-unit.target: 一个控件，有时称为 trackbar，它使用户将调整中的设置给定的通过移动滑块的最小和最大值之间的增量。

trans-unit.source: The volume controls in the Windows operating system are slider controls.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 操作系统卷控件是滑块控件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A system sound, which is associated with various system events.
trans-unit.target: 系统声音，与各种系统事件相关联。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A spin box, also known as an up-down control, which contains a pair of arrow buttons.
trans-unit.target: 数字调整框，也称为 up-down 控件，其中包含一对箭头按钮。

trans-unit.source: A user clicks the arrow buttons with a mouse to increment or decrement a value.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击箭头按钮，用鼠标递增或递减值。

trans-unit.source: A spin button control is most often used with a companion control, called a buddy window, where the current value is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 数值调节钮控件通常与附带控件，调用合作者窗口，其中显示的当前值一起使用。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A toolbar button that has a drop-down list icon directly adjacent to the button.
trans-unit.target: 具有一个按钮直接旁边的下拉列表图标工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The read-only text, such as in a label, for other controls or instructions in a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 只读的文本，例如，一个标签，其他控件或对话框中的说明。

trans-unit.source: Static text cannot be modified or selected.
trans-unit.target: 无法修改或选择静态文本。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A status bar, which is an area typically at the bottom of an application window that displays information about the current operation, state of the application, or selected object.
trans-unit.target: 状态栏，是通常在底部显示有关当前操作的应用程序中，或所选对象的状态信息的应用程序窗口的区域。

trans-unit.source: The status bar can have multiple fields that display different kinds of information, such as an explanation of the currently selected menu command in the status bar.
trans-unit.target: 状态栏可以显示不同种类的信息，如状态栏中的当前选定的菜单命令的说明的多个字段。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A table containing rows and columns of cells and, optionally, row headers and column headers.
trans-unit.target: 包含行和列的单元格和行 （可选） 的表头和列标头。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The selectable text that can be editable or read-only.
trans-unit.target: 可选择文本，它可以是可编辑或只读的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A title or caption bar for a window.
To be added.
A toolbar, which is a grouping of controls that provide easy access to frequently used features.
trans-unit.target: 一个工具栏，是可以轻松访问经常使用的功能的控件的分组。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A tool tip, which is a small rectangular pop-up window that displays a brief description of the purpose of a button.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示，它是一个小的矩形弹出窗口，显示一个按钮的用途的简短说明。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A blank space between other objects.
trans-unit.target: 其他对象之间的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A window frame, which usually contains child objects such as a title bar, client, and other objects typically contained in a window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口框架，通常包含如标题栏、 客户端和在窗口中通常包含其他对象的子对象。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
